Text: Great job, do you have 720p eps 1-7?
I wish I did; they probably exist somewhere, but I don't know how to access them. Anyone have some ideas?

I don't suppose anyone has got (or can point me towards) a regular avi file for this episode? The 720 version is great, but I'd really love to burn the entire season onto a DVD and I unfortunately can't use this file for that purpose. There's an avi version on a couple of sites but several people have said it's corrupted and although it plays OK it can't be burned to DVD :( Is anybody capable of doing a re-rip or something along those lines?
no but your capable of doing a google search on how to do that easily for free
convert this episode to that format that is, google it
Unfortunately that idea has already been tried over on the Demonoid forums and the file still came out as un-burnable :(

To those looking for a standard rip, there's a torrent containing every episode, search tim and eric season cinco, it's 1.12gb.

But this 720p version was glorious. I was geniunely almost sick watching it. Thank you.
